doc.previous: Other popular team sports include curling street hockey cricket rugby and softball Cricket is the fastest growing sport in Canada currently Popular individual sports include auto racing boxing cycling golf hiking horse racing ice skating rodeo skateboarding skiing snowboarding swimming tennis triathlon track and field water sports and wrestling As a country with a generally cool climate Canada has enjoyed greater success at the Winter Olympics than at the Summer Olympics although significant regional variations in climate allow for a wide variety of both team and individual sports Major multi sport events in Canada include the 2010 Winter Olympics
